chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: This document is intended to help you to migrate an existing Exadel JSF or Struts projects into JBoss Developer Studio. Preferences can be exported from Eclipse 3.2.0 (3.2.1 or 3.2.2) and imported in Eclipse 3.3 by the standard Eclipse means.

section.title: Other relevant resources on the topic
section.para: All JBoss Developer Studio/JBoss Tools documentation you can find here.
The latest documentation builds are available here.
